column4: Can someone help me with problem considering compiling sources?

I've done as the manual suggested, and ran ./configure in order to configure the compile, and then simply inputting "make" (as manual suggests), but it keeps yelling me something about "No makefile found", or "No rule to make file" or something
after running the configures, it says at the bottom of the check list, that c++ compiler cannot make executables, and I've already installed gcc
